overview: For this film, Takashi Makino allowed himself to be inspired by the earth. In a never-ending stream of images, we recognize elements from the forest that he then reduces to an abstraction. The film came about as a classical composition in which the picture and the musical contribution of Jim Oâ€™Rourke link up seamlessly and lead the mood in turn. A sense of freedom is what predominates.
title: Elements of Nothing
